ygData.subject: RE: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: I like that JBoot idea. Now that I think about it, I like that alot. You know what would be better, is something like the Gem off that gnoll in Split Paw, plus
ygData.messageBody:
I like that JBoot idea. Now that I think about it, I like that alot. You
know what would be better, is something like the Gem off that gnoll in Split
Paw, plus some feathers. People could still get around this, by having a
high level kill the mob and a low level get the loot... *sigh* Just like
crafted stuff now... Better though.

OR, make the item needed drop like the Box of Abukar....off any mob of
sufficient level but rare as hell...heh.

Course, I'm a shaman, so I can say to make it as hard as ye want, I don't
care ;-) SoW is a fast cast and uses about 1/100th of my mana now, I hardly
mind casting it. Anyone that walks up to me and hails me anymore gets it
before they ask... *chuckle*

-----Original Message-----
From: Jones, Brian [mailto:Brian.Jones@...]
Sent: October 11, 1999 7:05 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: RE: [EQCheats] JBoots, Rubi & Beyond


From: "Jones, Brian" <Brian.Jones@...>

Yes but the ice comment quest should be difficult as it is for high level
wizards (minus of the bugs of course, that isn't good). If they make the
rubi quests like they did the crafted armor quest I think it will work out
well. Make it necessary for high priced gems and a fairly accessible
dropped item from multiple mobs and it will go well. The jboots should
require a few rubies and maybe the feathers of a griffon.

> ----------
